page.title: 19Leisure Activities and clubs
page.content: In Tollesbury there are many orgainised activities for all age groups. {Children Brownies and Guides, Cubs and Sea scouts, Church youth clubs, Playschool (for under 5's), Table Tennis club, Badminton, Library, Ballet, Judo, Young Ornithologists and Woodcraft Folk. {Adults Clog Dancing, Cricket, Baby Clinic, Hockey, British Legion, Cruising and Sailing club, C.N.D.(Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament) and Football. {Political Orgainisations Labour, Conservative, Liberal/Alliance clubs. {Church Activities Fishers, Christian Bookshop,Silver Threads (for old people) and Tollesbury Singers.
